response.original_title: America Rewritten: What the World Would Lose if the US Constitution Was Erased
response.overview: In “America Rewritten,” an exclusive special feature from The Epoch Times, we speak with leading experts on how history is being falsified and how the system of government is being misrepresented, and we explore what the world would lose if the American Constitution were lost
response.title: America Rewritten: What the World Would Lose if the US Constitution Was Erased
